WELCOME TO MCMI

MCMI plan, organize and implement professional development training programmes, meetings, seminars, study visits, conferences, and sports and leisure activities. MCMI provides services for diverse ranges of customers.

Our Customers

Our customers range from small groups with limited budget to large or medium size groups having enough resources. Our focus is on helping to make your expectation come true. We help and facilitate with understanding of your resources.

What we do?

We help our customers by providing customized facilitation in international standard. We facilitate and organize your training programs, events or visits according to your budget and requirement.

Our objective?

Customer satisfaction is MCMI’s main objective. We care with utmost details and courtesy to all customers and provide quality and genuine services to all our customers.

Our commitment

Customer satisfaction is MCMI’s main objective. We care with utmost details and courtesy to all customers and provide quality and genuine services to all our customers.
